thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: On a budget
thread.title_full: On a budget - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DrBob625
title: On a budget
text: This is a decent modern place to stay for a short visit - especially if constrained to a price but don't want to stay in one of the many older but less attractive hotels around central London in this price bracket. Usual unfussy Holiday Inn Express facilities and routine. Nearest Tube is an easy walk, connects to Overground and District Line - Change after one stop to Picadilly Line.
